exercises.title: The Great Fruit Swap
exercises.description: Help two friends swap their fruits using variables!
exercises.taskDescription: Oh no! Alex has a banana but wants an apple, while Sam has an apple but wants a banana. Help them swap their fruits by using a temporary variable called 'temp'!
exercises.initialCode:
# Alex and Sam need to swap their fruits!
alex_fruit = "banana"
sam_fruit = "apple"

# Use temp to help swap the fruits
exercises.solution:
alex_fruit = "banana"
sam_fruit = "apple"
temp = alex_fruit
alex_fruit = sam_fruit
sam_fruit = temp

validationParams.expectedOutcome:
alex_fruit = "banana"
sam_fruit = "apple"
temp = alex_fruit
alex_fruit = sam_fruit
sam_fruit = temp

exercises.title: The Circus Animal Feast
exercises.description: Calculate the total fruits needed for all the circus animals!
exercises.taskDescription: The circus animals are hungry! Each elephant needs 5 fruits, each monkey needs 3 fruits, and we have 2 elephants and 4 monkeys. Calculate the total fruits needed and store the result in 'total_fruits'.
exercises.initialCode:
# Calculate the total fruits needed for all animals

# Number of animals
elephants = 2
monkeys = 4

# Fruits per animal
elephant_fruits = 5
monkey_fruits = 3

# Calculate total fruits needed
exercises.solution:
elephants = 2
monkeys = 4
elephant_fruits = 5
monkey_fruits = 3
total_fruits = (elephants * elephant_fruits) + (monkeys * monkey_fruits)

validationParams.expectedOutcome:

monkeys = 4
elephant_fruits = 5

exercises.title: The Circus Ride Eligibility
exercises.description: Check if visitors are eligible for the thrilling circus rides!
exercises.taskDescription: The circus has a special ride with two requirements: visitors must be at least 12 years old AND at least 120 cm tall. Create a variable called 'can_ride' that checks if a visitor meets both requirements.
exercises.initialCode:
# Visitor's age and height
visitor_age = 14
visitor_height = 130

# Ride requirements
min_age = 12
min_height = 120

# Check if the visitor can ride
# Store the result in 'can_ride'
exercises.solution:
visitor_age = 14
visitor_height = 130
min_age = 12
min_height = 120
can_ride = (visitor_age >= min_age) and (visitor_height >= min_height)
